ygData.subject: Re: Enchanters
ygData.msgSnippet: ... least ... plats. ... Hehe, I reach lvl 3.5 last night.  Hopefully can reach lvl 4 tonight.  The consider command is not true, I con a bear and it say
ygData.messageBody:
> >>Hahaha! You will start earning money once you hit LvL 5 ... well at
least
> for me. If you ever make a trip to Qeynos, I'd be able to spare a few
plats.
> 3 or so.

Hehe, I reach lvl 3.5 last night. Hopefully can reach lvl 4 tonight. The
"consider" command is not true, I con a bear and it say fair chance. When
I start to fight, my hp drop so fast! Lucky someone leave an advice to die
at somewhere easy to find. I always run back to some place I know well b4
I die. Me start going to east commonland at lvl 2 - coz bats/rats take too
long for me to rise lvl, so I decided to take a risk to go out. Anyway, no
pain no gain, no gain no glory, hahaha ;)

> >>Nope! But enchanting jewels are good ;-) Useful to boost stats.
Ah, then maybe it will be a good source of income right? Any other skills
to recommand for an adventuring enchanter? :)

> >>Hahaha! This I am not sure! I've never been to Freeport!
I met Yiyang last night and he given me some clothing, so touched, I've
been searchinig/hunting few days and not yet find a decent piece of pant
(hard to buy the right stuffs coz most of them r for other race or too
expensive for me). Thx Yiyang ;)

Zilred, de Enchanter
